mapper.insert: insert into odc.user (id, password, name, userGrade, phoneNumber, intro, confirm,imgPath) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{userGrade}, #{phoneNumber}, #{intro}, #{confirm},#{imgPath})
mapper.select: select userNumber from odc.user where id = #{id} and password= #{password}
select count(userNumber) from odc.user where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update odc.user set id=#{id}, password=#{password}, name=#{name}, userGrade=#{userGrade}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, intro=#{intro}, confirm=#{confirm} where id=#{id}
